mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodModelImgCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , MODEL_NO , MODEL_IMG_TURN , DSP_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_MODEL_IMG_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MODEL_NO = #{modelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MODEL_IMG_TURN = #{modelImgTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
